sentences.sCn: 就这样这只小鸭离开了。

sentences.sContent: The poor duckling was chased and harassed by all the ducklings because he was very ugly.
sentences.sContent_eng: The poor duckling was chased and harassed by all the ducklings because he was very ugly.
sentences.sCn: 这只可怜的小鸭被所有的小鸭追逐和骚扰，因为他长得很丑。

sentences.sContent: Oh, kill me!" said the poor duckling, and he waited for his death bowing his head towards the water.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oh, kill me!" said the poor duckling, and he waited for his death bowing his head towards the water.
sentences.sCn: 可怜的小鸭说着朝水中低头，等待死亡的来临。 但他在清澈的水中看到什么样了呢？

phrases.pCn: 丑小鸭；小时难看长大后变得才貌出众的人

words.tran: 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分
